Modules¶

Camera¶

class Camera¶

Class that allow obtain a picture since a image source (webcam or ip camera)

Camera.getPicture()¶
Returns:bool – the ok value
Returns:image – the image

PictureProcessing¶

PictureProcessing.detectFaces(img)¶

Detect a human faces in the picture

Parameters:img (Image) – The picture where the human faces will be detected
Returns:rects (Rectangle) – tab of rectangles contains humab faces
PictureProcessing.smoothFaces(rects, img)¶

Apply a blur where human faces has been detected

Parameters:
  • rects (Rectangle) – The rectangles where the human face has been detected
  • img (Image) – The picture where the human faces will be detected
Returns:

img (Image) – Picture with a human face blurring

Main¶

savePicture(img)¶
Save the picture passed in parameter
Parameters:img (Image) – the picture who should be saved
loadConfig()¶

Load a parameters since a config file (config.cfg)

Parameters
  • freqPictures (int)
Returns:freqPictures (int) – the numbers of seconds between capture photos
__main__()¶

The main function. Start a picture processing application.
